SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis

Package Server.Messages

package Server.Messages
This package contains the classes that are responsible for the handling of the messages.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Server
    This package contains the classes that are used in the server side of the application.
  • Class
    Description
    AchievementCardsMessage
    This message is used to send the achievement cards to the client
    AchievementDeckDrawInvalidMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that the draw from the achievement deck is invalid
    AlreadyDoneMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that the action they tried to do is already done
    CardNotPlaceableMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that the card placement is invalid
    ChatMessage
    This message is used to send a message to the chat and update the clients
    ChatMessageIsEmptyMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that they cannot send an empty message to the chat
    ColorNotYetSetMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that he needs to set his color before doing what he tried to do
    DrawCardMessage
    This message is used to draw a card from a deck and to give the drawn card to the client who drew it
    EmptyDeckMessage
    Message to inform the client that the deck he is trying to draw from, in the position he is trying to draw from, is empty
    EndGamePhaseMessage
    This message is used to inform the client that the end game phase has started
    GameAlreadyFinishedMessage
    Message to inform the client that he cannot do what he tried to do because the game has already finished
    GameAlreadyStartedMessage
    Message to inform the client that he cannot do what he tried to do because the game has already started
    GameNotYetStartedMessage
    Message to inform the client that he cannot do what he tried to do because the game hasn't yet started
    InitialHandMessage
    Message to send the client their initial hand
    InvalidCardMessage
    Message to inform the client that the card he has selected is invalid.
    InvalidNameMessage
    Message to inform the client that the name he tried to use has already been taken
    LeaderboardMessage
    Message to send the client the leaderboard
    LobbyPlayersMessage
    Message to send the client the info of the players in the lobby.
    NameNotYetSetMessage
    Message to inform the client that he needs to set his name before he can play
    NewPlayerMessage
    Message to inform the client that a new player has joined the game
    NewTurnMessage
    Message to inform the client that a new turn has started
    NotYetGivenCardMessage
    Message to inform the client that he still needs to receive one or more cards to do what he wants
    NotYourTurnMessage
    Message to inform the client that it is not his turn, so he cannot do what he tried to do
    OtherPlayerDrawCardMessage
    Message to inform the client that another player has drawn a card
    OtherPlayerInitialHandMessage
    Message to inform the client that another player has received his initial hand
    OtherPlayerPlayCardMessage
    Message to inform the client that a player has placed a card on the board
    OtherPlayerReconnectionMessage
    Message to inform the client that another player has reconnected
    PlayCardMessage
    Message to ask the server to place a card
    PlayerAlreadyPlayingMessage
    Message to inform the client that the player with the name he tried to reconnect to is already playing
    PlayerColorMessage
    Message to ask the server to set the color and to notify the client that a player has set his color
    PlayerDisconnectedMessage
    Message to inform the client that a player has disconnected
    PlayerNameMessage
    Message to ask the server to add a player with a certain name and to notify the client if the name has been set correctly
    PlayerNotFoundMessage
    Message to inform the client that a player does not exist.
    PlayerOrderMessage
    Message to inform the client of the order of the players
    ReadyStatusMessage
    Message to ask the server to set a player as ready or not ready and to notify the clients that a player is ready or not ready
    ReconnectionMessage
    Message to ask the server to reconnect and to notify the reconnecting client with the game data
    ReconnectionNameMessage
    Message to inform the client that a player has reconnected
    RemovedPlayerMessage
    Message to inform the client that a player has been removed
    SavedGameMessage
    Message to ask the server to join a saved game and to notify the client with the game data
    SetSecretCardMessage
    Message to ask the server to set a player's secret card and to notify the clients that a player's secret card has been set
    SetStartingCardMessage
    Message to ask the server to set a player's starting card and to notify the clients that a player's starting card has been set
    StartGameMessage
    Message to send the client the starting deck data
    StartingCardsMessage
    Message to send the client his starting card
    ToClientMessage
    This interface is used to define the execution of a message that is sent to the clients
    ToDoFirstMessage
    Message to inform the client that he has to do something before doing what he tried to do
    TooManyPlayersMessage
    Message to inform the client that there are too many players in the game, so he cannot join
    ToServerMessage
    This interface is used to define the execution of a message that is sent to the server
